name: AVAudioSession.Port
desc: A structure that defines the available input and output port types.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the raw value you specify.

items.name: static let builtInMic: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: An input from a device’s built-in microphone.

items.name: static let headsetMic: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: An input from a wired headset’s built-in microphone.

items.name: static let lineIn: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: A line-level input from the dock connector.

items.name: static let airPlay: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: An output to an AirPlay device.

items.name: static let bluetoothA2DP: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: An output to a Bluetooth A2DP device.

items.name: static let bluetoothLE: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: An output to a Bluetooth Low Energy (LE) device.

items.name: static let builtInReceiver: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: An output to the speaker you hold to your ear when you’re on a phone call.

items.name: static let builtInSpeaker: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: An output to the device’s built-in speaker.

items.name: static let HDMI: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: An output to a High-Definition Multimedia Interface (HDMI) device.

items.name: static let headphones: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: An output to wired headphones.

items.name: static let lineOut: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: A line-level output to the dock connector.

items.name: static let AVB: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: An I/O connection to an Audio Video Bridging (AVB) device.

items.name: static let bluetoothHFP: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: An I/O connection to a Bluetooth Hands-Free Profile device.

items.name: static let displayPort: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: An I/O connection to a DisplayPort device.

items.name: static let carAudio: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: An I/O connection through Car Audio.

items.name: static let fireWire: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: An I/O connection to a FireWire device.

items.name: static let PCI: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: An I/O connection to a Peripheral Component Interconnect (PCI) device.

items.name: static let thunderbolt: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: An I/O connection to a Thunderbolt device.

items.name: static let usbAudio: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: An I/O connection to a Universal Serial Bus (USB) device.

items.name: static let virtual: AVAudioSession.Port
items.desc: An I/O connection that doesn’t correspond to physical audio hardware.
